na ɔdze wenyin ture no ama afofor.  Na wɔtsee no

column2: "aso ɔfa mbra mu dɛ yɛma Kaesar ntoboa anaa?"

column2: "Na woenntum ennsuo ne nsɛm mu wɔ nkorɔfo no enyim; na no mbuae no yɛɛ hɔn nwanwa na womuaa hɔn ano."
